titlestmt.subtitle: Papers of Upton Beall Sinclair and Mary Craig (Kimbrough) Sinclair, 1900-1963, at the Lilly Library, Indiana University
titlestmt.author: Mary McSparran

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-02-18 22:21:26 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

change.item: Encoded finding aid added to and updated. Added abstract, bioghist, arrangement, and full inventory.

did.abstract: The Sinclair mss. IV, 1900-1963, consists of correspondence, writings, and monetary statements of author Upton Beall Sinclair, 1878-1968, and of his wife, Mary Craig (Kimbrough) Sinclair, 1883-1961.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Upton Beall Sinclair, 1878-1968, author; and Mary Craig (Kimbrough Sinclair), 1883-1961, author.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Sinclair mss. IV, 1900-1963, consists of correspondence and writings of author Upton Beall Sinclair, 1878-1968, and of his wife, Mary Craig (Kimbrough) Sinclair, 1883-1961. Writings include American Nights Entertainment, Love's Progress, and The Story of Craig by Upton Sinclair; The Gold Spangled Banner by Edgar Selwyn and Upton Sinclair, and My Husband, Upton Sinclair by Mary Craig (Kimbrough) Sinclair. Agreements & Copyrights include royalty reports and statements from Albert and Charles Bonu, Boni and Liveright, Farrar and Rinehart, and T. Wener Laurie, and Viking Press. Miscellaneous includes various items related to The Cup of Fury, King Coal, Southern Belle, telepathy & hypnotism, and miscellaneous writing fragments. Personal includes bank statements and cancelled checks.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series: I. Correspondence, II. Writings, III. Agreements and Copyrights, IV Royalties, V. Miscellaneous, and VI. Personal Papers, VII. The Brass Check By Upton Sinclair and Notes

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Sinclair mss. IV, Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: See Sinclair mss., Sinclair mss. II, Sinclair mss. III, Sinclair mss. V, Sinclair mss. VI, Sinclair mss. VII, Sinclair mss. VIII, Sinclair, D. mss., and Sinclair, M.C.K. mss., also located at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
